Focus on business logic: docstring inheritance for Modin classes/functions, handling pandas docs, customizing doc modules, excluding certain parents, optionally overwriting existing docstrings, inserting pandas API links. Inputs: cls_or_func (class or function), doc_module (module name string), parent (object to inherit docs from), excluded list, overwrite_existing flag, apilink optional. - `doc_module: str`（文档来源模块路径）
- `parent: object`（提供原始 docstring 的父对象）
- `excluded: List[object]`（不从其继承 docstring 的对象列表）
- `overwrite_existing: bool`（是否覆盖已有 doc
